column4: hi, i am trying to compile the source code of workrave on xubuntu edgy

I have http://packages.freecontrib.org/plf/ and http://archive.canonical.com/ubuntu set in synaptic.  Are these the repositories you speak of ?
plf and canonicals commercial repos are unnecessary for workrave
can you please tell me how to add the necessary repos' .
i tried following guides on the internet but it did work when i try to reload in synaptic
let me clean up my sources.list file and send to you
where do i place this text
I've only got these and a w32codecs package from 'medibuntu'
ok great.  thanks for the help
